basics.name: Alexey Ivanov
basics.label: Front-End / Software / React / Developer
basics.summary:
As an experienced Front-End Developer, I excel in building robust and dynamic front-end applications using React and TypeScript. Specializing in web development, I focus on creating user-friendly interfaces, optimizing speed, and ensuring scalability for projects. My collaborative approach in agile environments consistently helps me meet project targets and deadlines by seamlessly merging UI/UX design principles with functional code to deliver visually appealing applications.

My key skills include React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS. Known for my problem-solving abilities, adaptability, attention to detail, and collaborative nature, I thrive in remote and distributed team settings, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.
Starting as a junior developer, I embarked on a journey of continuous learning, mastering foundational technologies like React, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Through hands-on experience, mentorship, and staying updated on industry trends, I advanced to become an intermediate/senior developer, equipped with the expertise, confidence, and leadership skills to tackle complex technical challenges and mentor others.

My dedication to continuous learning is evident through my participation in various courses and certifications, focusing on Node.js, React, GraphQL, and software architecture. This commitment is reinforced by my high rankings in JavaScript, React, front-end development, HTML, and CSS assessments on LinkedIn Skill Assessments.
Passionate about using technology to create impactful solutions, I am always eager to take on new challenges and embrace emerging technologies. I am actively seeking opportunities to drive innovation in collaborative projects and work with forward-thinking teams.
I am open to new opportunities and excited to collaborate on exciting projects. Please reach out if you're interested in working together.

work.name: Global Relay
work.description: Global Relay is a self-made, profitable technology company that has grown from 4 to over 1,600 employees and 20,000 customers without taking outside investment, building its own high-quality, innovative solutions while promoting an inspiring work culture and demonstrating leadership in environmental and social responsibility.
work.summary:
My key achievements include developing an enhanced frontend architecture, increasing security by introducing new password selection features, reducing technical debt, improving design documentation, and successfully onboarding new co-op students. These contributions have significantly improved system performance, user experience and reduced unauthorized access attempts and development time.
 — Enhanced user experience & performance: The implementation of a new frontend architecture not only decreased system errors by 20%, but also improved the longevity, increased overall system performance by 25%, and reduced development time by 20%.
 — Bolstered Security: Development of an advanced password selection feature resulted in strengthening security and reducing unauthorized access attempts by 30%.
 — Reduced Technical Debt: Focused efforts on refactoring legacy system components led to a significant 25% rise in system performance
 — Efficient Project Understanding: By improving design documentation, project clarity was enhanced, leading to a 20% cut in development time.
 — Team Development: Successfully mentored and onboarded 5 co-op students, contributing to team growth and capacity building.
